page.title: 05I LIVE IN EATHORPE IN 1985
page.content: {School days & My House} The room is about 6feet long and 6feet wide Our house is an old hotel that we have bought. .It has 3 houses on the same grounds,a hotel,a bungalow,& a lodge. On school days I usually get up at 7.00.The school bus fetches me at 8.25,school starts at 9.00 & finishes at 3.45. {My Family.} I have a mum & dad of course. I have one sister called Zoe Claire she is 8 years old.My name is Amy & I am 13.I have 2 brothers one is called Uan Kester who is 5,the other is Terry David who is 3. {Weekends. { }On Saturdays I help around the house sometimes I go to help at a farm or I have my friend Rose come round.
